Title: Adidas Online Reviews 389
Content: Most reviewers were let down by their experience overall . Customers express significant dissatisfaction with the company's customer service, ...

Title: Why I Can't Stand Adidas: A Closer Look
Content: One of the major complaints about Adidas products is their inability to maintain cleanliness and freshness , as they often lack washable options.

Content: Let's look at some of the negative comments (there are few, only 98 out of 1005) to see what Adidas can do better. Adidas Samba shoes - Negative ...
